relation.text: was chaunted delightfully -- as it was a Sacrament day
had not seen him for 3 days
was going to Weymouth for a few days
saw no neceſsity for my staying here longer than 20 days
days shd . be hot , it would not be so well for me -- after my little Tour he said
thank my dear father for his tenderneſs for me This is Wednesday
